body_html:
@gunan I think you find the solution. I have just tried the new command without -D GOOGLE_CUDA=1. I compiled a custom op with tf rc1.5 installed from source and pip. No error occurred and the custom op just passed the test on both cup and gpu. 😆😆😆
Anyone help to try this solution with other versions of tf?

body:
@gunan I think you find the solution. I have just tried the new command without  -D GOOGLE_CUDA=1. I compiled a custom op with tf rc1.5 installed from source and pip. No error occurred and the custom op just passed the test on both cup and gpu. :laughing::laughing::laughing:
Anyone help to try this solution with other versions of tf?
